title: Hi little bug on Fiora's Tooltip after rework
body:
Here's a but on fiora's tooltips I get. Seem the other fiora don't get it !
http://nsa38.casimages.com/img/2015/08/06/150806062127685420.jpg
http://nsa38.casimages.com/img/2015/08/06/150806062127866632.png

Got old tooltip on Q
Passive W E and R get no tooltips at all

replies.body: Why do we even have a PBE. This is why we can't have nice things.
Pbe is for skins, didnt ya know?
Could you try relogging to see if the issue is fixed?
